metadata.title: CVE-2024-29511 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Artifex Ghostscript before 10.03.1, when Tesseract is used for OCR, has adirectory traversal issue that allows arbitrary file reading (and writingof error messages to arbitrary files) via OCRLanguage. For example,exploitation can use debug_file /tmp/out and user_patterns_file/etc/passwd.

criterions.comment: ghostscript package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
